This royal birthplace located 6 km from the center of the district and is said to be the birthplace of the royal family, where a woman gave birth to seven sons at a time.

This Dubusha located 6.5 km from the woreda and is a place where the people of Kale Zale come here before going to Tsada during the Meskel festival to sing a traditional song and celebrate three times.
